paper_abstract: In this paper, a new approach for solving fuzzy integro-differential equations (FIDEs) with fuzzy initial value is considered under strongly generalized H-differentiability. Notice the point that this method is used for fuzzy integro-differential equations with trapezoid fuzzy initial value. The idea of the presented approach is constructed based on the extending of 0-cut and 1-cut solutions of original FIDEs. The solution of FIDE will be found by considering convex combination of 0-cut and 1-cut solutions. The obtained solution will be exact by choosing the different types of derivatives.
paper_title: A new method for solving fuzzy integro-differential equation under generalized differentiability
